titles: The one necessary thing to be sought briefly touched in a four-fold dialogue upon some of the great and most concerning truths of practical religion.
author: Fleming, Robert, 1630-1694.
Fleming, Robert, 1660?-1716.
notes: Wing attributes this work to Robert Fleming the younger, however NUC pre-1956 imprints attributes it to the elder Fleming.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
